long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows zati.gematria.tech to retrieve your LinkedIn credentials.
Zati generates custom LinkedIn messages for users.
We retrieve the cookies from LinkedIn with the addon to allow connection in one click instead of having users to manually copy paste the cookies.
